1110101010100100 0111101011011000 1 -> sum: 0110010101111101, cout: 1
0101001110010000 0111100001110100 1 -> sum: 1100110000000101, cout: 0
1011011011000010 0101110001100000 1 -> sum: 0001001100100011, cout: 1
1001010011100010 0110000101001101 0 -> sum: 1111011000101111, cout: 0
1000010101100010 1110110100001101 1 -> sum: 0111001001110000, cout: 1
1100111111001101 1100111001101011 0 -> sum: 1001111000111000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
